items.sentence: You may ride my bicycle anytime you want to.
You may borrow my bicycle whenever you want.
I can't really see anything from where I am.
What did you do the last time you were here?
Have you made a list of everything you need?
I wouldn't be surprised if it snows tonight.
Tom wasn't surprised that Mary won the race.
This is the first time I've ever tried this.
I pretended that I didn't hear the question.
I have absolutely no idea where I should go.
I was told that I should stay away from Tom.
The only person here that Tom knows is Mary.
I heard that you went to see Tom last night.
Why didn't you tell me that belonged to Tom?
Are you really going to do that by yourself?
We thought you'd been captured by the enemy.
Tom won't be able to finish that in an hour.
A prophet is not recognized in his own land.
Imitation is the sincerest form of flattery.
Old soldiers never die. They just fade away.
